22.dinner_menu_description: Pan seared redfish topped with Jumbo lump crab meat with little bit of breading and then toasted to perfection. Drizzled with lemon butter sauce, served over garlic blistered green beans and roasted red bell pepper sauce.

32.dinner_menu_description: Panko crusted chicken breast flat grilled and then baked to Golden Brown topped with artichoke hearts, capers in lemon butter sauce. Serves with garlic green beans.

42.dinner_menu_description: 12 ounce. Ribeye have most fat between all steaks which makes it most flavorful. Serves with bacon Brussels and mash potatoes.

52.dinner_menu_description: 6oz. Very tender with good flavor, but not as flavorful as ribeye. Mash potatoes and garlic green beans.

62.dinner_menu_description: Slow braised short rib in Shiner beer for 5.5 hours topped with caramelized onions and drizzled with shiner brown grawy. Served over Gouda grits and bacon brussel sprouts.

92.dinner_menu_description: Jalapeño, cheese and crab with breadding staffed shrimp and wrapped in bacon. Deep fried and served over creole sauce (tomato based lobster sauce) with grits.

112.dinner_menu_description: Wagyu beef (fancy breed of the cow), cheddar, bacon, lettuce, tomato, fresh red onion, chipotle aioli (mayo based sauce), rosemary and parmesan fry mix. Patty cooked to desired temperature.

132.dinner_menu_description: Sautéed shrimp and jalapeño sausage, cherry tomatoes, with fettuccini in Creole Sauce - tomato based lobster sauce.

142.dinner_menu_description: CRISPY FRIED OR GRILLED. Focaccia, lettuce, mozzarella, smoked bacon, avocado, tomato, chipotle aioli, rosemary and parmesan fry mix

152.dinner_menu_description: Corn tortillas, pico de gallo, shredded lettuce, avocado, chipotle aioli, served with street corn casserole. Glutein Free

162.dinner_menu_description: Marinated tuna (not cooked), ginger cilantro slaw, ponzu, avocado, gochujang aioli on fried Wontong shell. Served with street corn casserole

182.dinner_menu_description: Cup or Bowl. Garnished with fried tortilla crisps and queso fresco

202.dinner_menu_description: mixed greens, tomato, carrots, cucumber, and sweet sherry vinaigrette dressing

212.dinner_menu_description: Flat grilled califlower in shape of crabcake and cilantro tartar on the side

222.dinner_menu_description: Espresso and blackaning rubbed pork chop grilled to med well or well done temperature. Serves with Sweet potato mash and broccolini. Topped with sweet Woodford glaze

232.dinner_menu_description: New York Strip cooked to your liking and sliced, topped with peppercorn mushroom gravy. Served with mash potato and green beans

242.dinner_menu_description: 5 seared scallops topped with pistachios served over sweet potato mash and broccolini. Accompanied with Chanpagne Safron sauce

252.dinner_menu_description: Grilled chicken with fettucine, broccolini, spinach, cherry tomato in tomato cream sauce

262.dinner_menu_description: Seared Salmon to Med Well (unless desired otherwise) topped with Lemon Cream & Dill sauce with jumbo crab meat. Served with corn cake and grilled squash and zuccini
